amendment.description: To authorize the establishment of American Dream Accounts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2243, under the order of 7/15/15, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 244.

action.text: Amendment SA 2243 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2089. (consideration: CR S5098-5104) To authorize the establishment of American Dream Accounts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2243, under the order of 7/15/15, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 244.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2243, under the order of 7/15/15, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 68 - 30. Record Vote Number: 244.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2243 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Coons to Amendment SA 2089.
